4. **RIGHT**: From (6,2) to (7,2). Check if (7,2) is safe. Looking at the board, row 2 (y=2) has a T at (6,2) and (5,2), etc. The cell (7,2) seems empty. My body after moving would be [(7,2), (6,2), (5,2)]. No collision. So RIGHT is also a possible move.

- From head (3,8), DOWN would run into your neck (unsafe). LEFT and RIGHT are safe but do not immediately progress toward any apple.
- The nearest apple is at (3,9). Moving UP immediately eats it, grows the snake, and keeps multiple safe follow-up options on the next turn.
